text: ai eemaanadaaron tum nashe kee haalat mein namaaz ke qareeb na jao taaki tum jo kuchh munh se kaho samajho bhee to aur na jinaabat kee haalat mein yaho tak ki gusl kar lo magar raah guzar mein ho (aur gusl mumakin nahin hai to alabatta zaroorat nahin) balki agar tum mareez ho aur paanee nuqasaan kare ya safar mein ho tumamen se kisee ka paikhaana nikal aae ya auraton se sohabat kee ho aur tumako paanee na mayassar ho (ki tahaarat karo) to paak mittee par taimoom kar lo aur (us ka tareeqa ye hai ki) apane munh aur haathon par mittee bhara haath phero to beshak khuda maaf karane vaala hai (aur) bakhsh ne vaala hai
